verbose_text: By fluorescent in situ hybridization (FISH), we found that at E12.5, miR-9 was expressed in some differentiating neurons (arrowheads) and was abundant in the ventricular zone (VZ) of the mouse neocortex, an area containing actively proliferating progenitors, (XREF_FIG A), which express Hes1 in a salt-and-pepper manner.
